item.description:
This April Fool's Day, join Boston By Foot on a walking tour like we've never done before!

Starting at the Old North Church and ending with a celebration at the Bell in Hand Tavern, this hour long tour will tell some wild and amazing stories--some of which are true and others are not. Is your knowledge of history good enough to know which is which? When the answers are revealed, those who guess best will win great prizes! THIS is the only time a Boston By Foot guide will intentionally lie to you...unless, of course, they're telling the truth!

The cost of this first-time event is only $20 (Boston By Foot organizational members $5). Cash bar and snacks provided at the end of the tour at Bell in Hand. 

No reservations necessary; rain or shine. Visit www.bostonbyfoot.org or call 617-3697-2345 for more information.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of the Old North Church, 193 Salem Street, at 2:00 pm
item.name: True Lies and False Facts: A Questionable Tour of Boston
